meanings.definition: Amautiks: a type of Inuit parka with a pouch for carrying a baby
meanings.sent1: She wore her amautiks to keep her baby warm.
meanings.sent2: The Inuit mother carefully sewed her amautiks for the winter.
meanings.sent3: The baby giggled happily in the cozy amautiks.
meanings.sent4: Her love for her child was woven into every stitch of the amautiks.
meanings.sent5: The colorful amautiks stood out against the snowy landscape.

meanings.definition: Amautiks: the plural form of amautik, referring to multiple Inuit parkas with baby pouches
meanings.sent1: In the museum, there were many amautiks on display.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to sew new amautiks for the upcoming season.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show featured a unique collection of amautiks.
meanings.sent4: The row of amautiks hanging on the line looked like a colorful rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with vendors selling traditional amautiks.
